The R package `rbibtools` imports, cleans, and handles `.bib` files
([BibTeX](https://www.bibtex.com/) references) exported by common references
management software (e.g. Mendeley, Zotero).



## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("FRBCesab/rbibtools")
```

Then you can attach the package `rbibtools`:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library("rbibtools")
```



## Overview

The main function of `rbibtools` is `read_bibtex()`. See the [Get started](https://frbcesab.github.io/rbibtools/articles/rbibtools.html) vignette for an
overview of the package.
